code: import React from"react";import{Accordion,AccordionItem,AccordionItemHeading,AccordionItemButton,AccordionItemPanel}from"react-accessible-accordion";import"react-accessible-accordion/dist/fancy-example.css";import data from'../ProjectsData.json';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export var Projects=function Projects(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"projectsDiv",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{id:"contactTitle",children:"Some of my recent projects"}),data.map(function(project,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Accordion,{className:"accordionDiv",allowZeroExpanded:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(AccordionItem,{className:"accordionHeading",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AccordionItemHeading,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AccordionItemButton,{style:{backgroundColor:"rgba(255,255,255,0)",fontSize:"1.4rem",fontWeight:"500"},children:project.title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AccordionItemPanel,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"projectsDesc",children:[project.description,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("b",{children:[" ",project.note," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:project.link,className:"btn btn-lg mt-1 projectBtn",children:"Link"})]})})]})},index);})]})});};
